title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 347: Featuring Kevin Weekes + HockeyFest Recap With Matt Murley
description:
On Episode 347 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets the guys are joined by Kevin Weekes. Weekesy (00:55:59) joined to discuss his media career, his NHL career, Marc-Andre Fleury and tons more. But first, the guys open up the show discussing the Barstool Sports HockeyFest from this past weekend in Detroit and the massive success behind the tournament. RA then recaps his unbelievable goalie performance while Biz, Whit, Grinnelli and Murls discuss their weekends as well. The guys then get to some NHL news, including the Darnell Nurse contract. The boys wrap up with some All Right Hamilton questions and the new Grinds My Gears segment from RA.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
